name: Spaceship trap
description:
A classic representative of the TDS genre with a unique atmosphere and implementation

Regardless of the level of development, the question of survival has always been the most urgent. You will also have to fight for your life - once on an alien ship as a result of an abduction, your goal will be to escape. On the way to the cherished freedom, you will have to overcome many different opponents and skillfully use your abilities.
